headline: Week’s Best: Vanguard Goes Deep on Financial Advice
summary: As part of an effort to grow its advice business, Vanguard has created a new advice and wealth management division and hired former Fidelity executive Joanna Rotenberg to lead it.  At Fidelity, Rotenberg oversaw the company’s retirement, brokerage, and wealth management businesses.  After a stellar 2024 for investors, investment pros at wealth management firms are eyeing 2025 with various levels of optimism.
